name: Erythrokeratodermia Variabilis et Progressiva
chief_complaint: My skin keeps changing colors and getting thick, scaly patches that come and go
prognosis: Chronic condition with variable progression; lesions may stabilize in adulthood but rarely resolve completely
description: A rare genodermatosis characterized by two distinct features: (1) transient, migratory erythematous patches (variabilis) and (2) fixed hyperkeratotic plaques (progressiva). Caused by connexin gene mutations leading to abnormal keratinocyte differentiation.
risk_factors: Family history of similar skin conditions
